title: ranked stuff
body:
So i logged on today and went and played a ranked game which was lost that's fine what I'm mostly annoyed about is finding out that game meant I went down to Bronze 1. why cant we get a demotion series for being down a division or at least getting a number or games on 0lp before getting dropped down after losing a game because knowing that losing that game meant dropping i would have played different tried harder and not give up( not that it would have done anything in that game). So we always know when we are gonna go up a division but why cant we see going down is all I'm wanting to know. 

Especially now that I've played two more games after that thinking I have to win at least the next 4-5 games to get back to silver. obviously I lost both of those games too because that would just be too easy now wouldn't it. but now i just just have next to no motivation to play ranked mode until seasons end because fuck dropping any further then i already have. 

Just why is it that we can't see when we are close to losing a rank because getting crushed in a game can get pretty depressing when the snowball wasn't in your control but to then get to the post game screen and getting a lovely message saying you have been demoted just kills any motivation to even want to try and climb back.

its just a thought seeming that we are going into pre-season when some changes can happen.

replies.body: Okay here's my explanation on why I think there shouldn't be a demotion series. Imagine you climb to a high rank, you earned that rank against many other players, it's a privilage to be that high. Promotions test that you truly deserve that title and demotions would just mean more people are in those ranks who save themselves barely every time, and if you're struggling to be in a rank, you don't belong there.
